title: Lightning Win Over Rangers Puts Tampa One Victory From Stanley Cup Finals
description: New York has come back throughout the playoffs, and will have to again on Saturday in Tampa with the Lightning one win from a third consecutive trip to the Stanley Cup Finals.
dc:creator: Victor Mather
media:description: Ondrej Palat, left, celebrating his game-winning goal on Thursday with his Lightning teammates Mikhail Sergachev, center, and Victor Hedman.
